_comment1: Information linking experiment FCS files to the appropriate cytometer channels, to be supplied by TA3

tasbe_experimental_data._comment1: the rdf:about field is a URI that persistently identifies this data collection
tasbe_experimental_data._comment2: Compatible TASBE interface version, following Semantic Versioning (semver.org).  Note that underspecifying version allows use of backward compatible upgrades.
tasbe_experimental_data._comment3: identifier linking to the instrument and optical configuration used for collecting data
tasbe_experimental_data._comment4: identifier linking to the process control data set collected for this experiment
tasbe_experimental_data._comment5: links from sample URIs to each FCS in the collection of experimental data; they will be groups into replicates in the processing configuration
